entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
